context: Instacart went public in September 2023. The company focused on advertising revenue and enterprise technology licensing while competing with retailers building their own delivery capabilities.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Whole Foods delivery, Amazon Fresh, and Prime grocery benefits

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Largest grocer with extensive delivery through Spark network

competitors.name: DoorDash
competitors.notes: Expanding grocery and retail delivery marketplace

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Adding grocery delivery to food delivery platform

competitors.name: Shipt (Target)
competitors.notes: Same-day delivery service for Target and other retailers

competitors.name: Gopuff
competitors.notes: Quick commerce for convenience and grocery items

competitors.name: Albertsons
competitors.notes: Own delivery capabilities competing with Instacart partnership
